org.openwms.common.location

Interface LocationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocationServiceImpl

    public interface LocationService
    A LocationService offers some useful methods regarding the general handling of Locations.

    This interface is declared generic typed that implementation classes can use any extension of Locations.

    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer

      Find and return all Locations that match the locationPK whereas the attributes of the LocationPK may include SQL wildcard operators, like '%', '_'.

      Return a list of all Locations not sorted and not filtered in natural order.

      Return a list of all LocationTypes not sorted and not filtered in natural order.

      • getAllLocations

        List<Location> getAllLocations()
        Return a list of all Locations not sorted and not filtered in natural order.
        Returns:
        All Locations as a list

      • removeMessages

        Location removeMessages(Long id,
                        List<Message> messages)
        Removes a list of Messages from a Location.
        Parameters:
        id - The technical key of the Location
        messages - The messages to be removed
        Returns:
        The updated Location

      • getAllLocationTypes

        List<LocationType> getAllLocationTypes()
        Return a list of all LocationTypes not sorted and not filtered in natural order.
        Returns:
        All LocationTypes as a list

      • deleteLocationTypes

        void deleteLocationTypes(List<LocationType> locationTypes)
        Delete already persisted LocationType instances.
        Parameters:
        locationTypes - A list of all instances to be deleted.

        LocationType saveLocationType(LocationType locationType)
        Saves a LocationType.
        Parameters:
        locationType - The type to save

        Returns:
        The Location

      • findLocations

        List<Location> findLocations(LocationPK locationPK)
        Find and return all Locations that match the locationPK whereas the attributes of the LocationPK may include SQL wildcard operators, like '%', '_'.
        Parameters:
        locationPK - The LocationPK
        Returns:
        All Locations or an empty list, never null

      • findByPlcCode

        Optional<Location> findByPlcCode(String plcCode)
        Find and return a Location by the given plcCode.
        Parameters:
        plcCode - The PLC Code
        Returns:
        The Location

      • findByLocationIdOrPlcCode

        Optional<Location> findByLocationIdOrPlcCode(String location)
        Find and return a Location Location by the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - The LocationPK or the PLC Code
        Returns:
        The Location

      • findAllOf

        List<Location> findAllOf(List<String> locationGroupName)
        Find and return all Locations that belong to a LocationGroup with the name locationGroupName.
        Parameters:
        locationGroupName - The name of the LocationGroup
        Returns:
        All LocationGroups or an empty list, never null

      • changeState

        void changeState(String pKey,
                 ErrorCodeTransformers.LocationStateIn stateIn,
                 ErrorCodeTransformers.LocationStateOut stateOut,
                 ErrorCodeVO errorCode)
        Change the infeed and outfeed state of a Location in respect of the according LocationGroup.
        Parameters:
        pKey - The persistent key identifier of the Location to change
        stateIn - The new infeed state
        stateOut - The new outfeed state
